column5: I am planning to buy an suv for the summer and the 2005 mazda tribute looks like a good option...i wanted to ask if anyone owns one or whose driven one to give me some info on it cuz everyone i ask doesn't really know anything bout this car!   ( some info i really need is if the car brakes are  parts cheap)?      Thx!
My aunt has one and loves it! I have never heard her complain about it
You would enjoy the BMW X5 much more
i believe it's basically the same car as the ford escape suv. i'm not sure if that helps or not.
